    Class

    class 
    Checking
    This class defines a Checking account with specific parameters for monthly interest and fees and inherits other properties and behaviors from the Account class
    class 
    CollegeChecking
    This class defines a College Checking account with specific parameters for monthly fees and inherits other properties and behaviors from the Account and Checking classes

    MoneyMarket
    This class defines a money market account with specific monthly interest and fees and inherits other properties and behaviors from the Savings class
